baseURL.description:
The base URL of the site.
Note that the default value is empty, but Hugo requires a valid URL (e.g. "https://example.com/") to work properly.
<docsmeta>{"identifiers": ["URL"] }</docsmeta> 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#baseurl

buildDrafts.description:
Whether to build content marked as draft.X
<docsmeta>{"identifiers": ["draft"] }</docsmeta> 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#builddrafts

buildExpired.description:
Whether to build content with expiryDate in the past.
<docsmeta>{"identifiers": ["expiryDate"] }</docsmeta> 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#buildexpired

buildFuture.description:
Whether to build content with publishDate in the future.
<docsmeta>{"identifiers": ["publishDate"] }</docsmeta> 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#buildfuture

defaultContentLanguage.description:
The language to apply to content without any language indicator. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#defaultcontentlanguage

defaultContentLanguageInSubdir.description:
By default, we put the default content language in the root and the others below their language ID, e.g. /no/.
Set this to true to put all languages below their language ID. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#defaultcontentlanguageinsubdir

defaultOutputFormat.description:
The default output format to use for the site.
If not set, we will use the first output format. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#defaultoutputformat

disableDefaultLanguageRedirect.description:
Disable generation of redirect to the default language when DefaultContentLanguageInSubdir is enabled. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#disabledefaultlanguageredirect

disableAliases.description:
Disable creation of alias redirect pages. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#disablealiases

disablePathToLower.description:
Disable lower casing of path segments. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#disablepathtolower

disableLanguages.description:
A list of languages to disable. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#disablelanguages

renderSegments.description:
The named segments to render.
This needs to match the name of the segment in the segments configuration. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#rendersegments

disableHugoGeneratorInject.description:
Disable the injection of the Hugo generator tag on the home page. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#disablehugogeneratorinject

disableLiveReload.description:
Disable live reloading in server mode. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#disablelivereload

enableEmoji.description:
Enable replacement in Pages' Content of Emoji shortcodes with their equivalent Unicode characters.
<docsmeta>{"identifiers": ["Content", "Unicode"] }</docsmeta> 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#enableemoji

mainSections.description:
THe main section(s) of the site.
If not set, Hugo will try to guess this from the content. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#mainsections

enableGitInfo.description:
When enabled, Hugo will apply Git version information to each Page if possible, which
can be used to keep lastUpdated in synch and to print version information.
<docsmeta>{"identifiers": ["Page"] }</docsmeta> 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#enablegitinfo

templateMetrics.description:
Enable to track, calculate and print metrics. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#templatemetrics

templateMetricsHints.description:
Enable to track, print and calculate metric hints. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#templatemetricshints

noBuildLock.description:
Enable to disable the build lock file. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#nobuildlock

ignoreLogs.description:
A list of log IDs to ignore. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#ignorelogs

ignoreFiles.description:
A list of regexps that match paths to ignore.
Deprecated: Use the settings on module imports. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#ignorefiles

enableMissingTranslationPlaceholders.description:
Enable to print greppable placeholders (on the form "[i18n] TRANSLATIONID") for missing translation strings. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#enablemissingtranslationplaceholders

panicOnWarning.description:
Enable to panic on warning log entries. This may make it easier to detect the source. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#paniconwarning

environment.description:
The configured environment. Default is "development" for server and "production" for build. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#environment

hasCJKLanguage.description:
Enable if the site content has CJK language (Chinese, Japanese, or Korean). This affects how Hugo counts words. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#hascjklanguage

paginate.description:
The default number of pages per page when paginating.
Deprecated: Use the Pagination struct. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#paginate

paginatePath.description:
The path to use when creating pagination URLs, e.g. "page" in /page/2/.
Deprecated: Use the Pagination struct. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#paginatepath

pluralizeListTitles.description:
Whether to pluralize default list titles.
Note that this currently only works for English, but you can provide your own title in the content file's front matter. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#pluralizelisttitles

capitalizeListTitles.description:
Whether to capitalize automatic page titles, applicable to section, taxonomy, and term pages. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#capitalizelisttitles

canonifyURLs.description:
Make all relative URLs absolute using the baseURL.
<docsmeta>{"identifiers": ["baseURL"] }</docsmeta> 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#canonifyurls

relativeURLs.description:
Enable this to make all relative URLs relative to content root. Note that this does not affect absolute URLs. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#relativeurls

removePathAccents.description:
Removes non-spacing marks from composite characters in content paths. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#removepathaccents

printUnusedTemplates.description:
Whether to track and print unused templates during the build. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#printunusedtemplates

printI18nWarnings.description:
Enable to print warnings for missing translation strings. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#printi18nwarnings

printPathWarnings.description:
ENable to print warnings for multiple files published to the same destination. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#printpathwarnings

refLinksNotFoundURL.description:
URL to be used as a placeholder when a page reference cannot be found in ref or relref. Is used as-is. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#reflinksnotfoundurl

refLinksErrorLevel.description:
When using ref or relref to resolve page links and a link cannot be resolved, it will be logged with this log level.
Valid values are ERROR (default) or WARNING. Any ERROR will fail the build (exit -1). 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#reflinkserrorlevel

sectionPagesMenu.description:
This will create a menu with all the sections as menu items and all the sections’ pages as “shadow-members”. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#sectionpagesmenu

summaryLength.description:
The length of text in words to show in a .Summary. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#summarylength

theme.description:
The theme(s) to use.
See Modules for more a more flexible way to load themes. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#theme

timeout.description:
Timeout for generating page contents, specified as a duration or in seconds. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#timeout

timeZone.description:
The time zone (or location), e.g. Europe/Oslo, used to parse front matter dates without such information and in the time function. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#timezone

titleCaseStyle.description:
Set titleCaseStyle to specify the title style used by the title template function and the automatic section titles in Hugo.
It defaults to AP Stylebook for title casing, but you can also set it to Chicago or Go (every word starts with a capital letter). 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#titlecasestyle

newContentEditor.description:
The editor used for opening up new content. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#newcontenteditor

noTimes.description:
Don't sync modification time of files for the static mounts. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#notimes

noChmod.description:
Don't sync modification time of files for the static mounts. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#nochmod

cleanDestinationDir.description:
Clean the destination folder before a new build.
This currently only handles static files. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#cleandestinationdir

ignoreVendorPaths.description:
A Glob pattern of module paths to ignore in the _vendor folder. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#ignorevendorpaths

themesDir.description:
The directory where Hugo will look for themes. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#themesdir

publishDir.description:
Where to put the generated files. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#publishdir

resourceDir.description:
The directory to put the generated resources files. This directory should in most situations be considered temporary
and not be committed to version control. But there may be cached content in here that you want to keep,
e.g. resources/_gen/images for performance reasons or CSS built from SASS when your CI server doesn't have the full setup. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#resourcedir

cacheDir.description:
The root directory for all cache files. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#cachedir

contentDir.description:
The content source directory.
Deprecated: Use module mounts. 
https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#contentdir

dataDir.description:
Deprecated: Use module mounts.

https://gohugo.io/configuration/all/#datadir

assetDir.description:
